org.osmdroid.bonuspack.location
Class GeocoderGisgraphy

java.lang.Object
  org.osmdroid.bonuspack.location.GeocoderGisgraphy

public class GeocoderGisgraphy
extends java.lang.Object

Experimental. Implements an equivalent to Android Geocoder class, based on OpenStreetMap data and Gisgraphy service.
Usage sample: http://services.gisgraphy.com/geocoding/geocode?address=nantes&country=fr&format=json First feedback: pros: better tolerance than Nominatim to changes in wording (e.g. "street" instead of "avenue", "road", etc) cons: - country parameter is currently mandatory => this is a major drawback. - lot of street names, hamlets, etc - that are displayed on standard OSM map - are not recognized at all, where Nominatim perfectly geocodes them. - there is no "maxresults/limit" parameter. 10 results are usually returned, a lot of them completely irrelevant.

Author:
M.Kergall
See Also:
Gisgraphy API
